translations: 陪伴，陪同；伴随，与……一起发生；为……伴奏（或伴唱）；附带，补充

sentences.sentence: Ken agreed to accompany me on a trip to Africa.
sentences.translation: 肯同意陪我去非洲旅行。

sentences.sentence: Barron invited her to accompany him to the races.
sentences.translation: 巴伦邀请了她陪他去看比赛。

sentences.sentence: Government monitors will continue to accompany reporters.
sentences.translation: 政府监督员们将继续陪同记者们。
